desc: Stinky Stuff is a complex compound, fishing bait additive made in the UK. The name itself 'Stinky Stuff' does exactly what it says on the tin. Stinky Stuff is designed to stimulate all species of fish to feed. It is used across all genres of fishing. Stinky Stuff can be safely sprayed onto all hook baits, feeder baits

layout.text: SAVE BIG ON OUR BEST START TO THE NEW SEASON NOW £23.99
